channel.title: remove on Documentation for Rnssp R Markdown Templates
channel.description: Recent content in remove on Documentation for Rnssp R Markdown Templates

item.title: Remove a template
item.description: When an Rnssp R Markdown template is no longer needed, it can be disposed of with the remove_rmd_template() utility function. Here is how to delete the essence_ccdd template: # Remove the `essence_ccdd` template remove_rmd_template("essence_ccdd") # or remove_rmd_template(template = "essence_ccdd") Never forget to ALWAYS RESTART YOUR R SESSION after removing a template from your existing Rnssp R package installation. Here is a live demo:
